Thank you!!!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: threadsintyme@...=
m 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

  S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: those "pops" "rolling thunder" "snaps" and "boom"=







  Derek,

  Remember that old maxim "Thoughts are things!" Doesn't h=
ave to be religious in nature. One may just have to wish to help another sp=
irit out by offering positive thinking. Also, it is possible to sent though=
ts to the spirit that are supportive in nature. The Universe will take your=
 intent and transfer your intent to the spirit. that intent will become act=
ionable by the spirit. Call it another form of spirit rescue, if you like. =


  Not everything in this Universe has to be measured in religious terms! =
Has more to do with one's own deep sense of Spirituality than religion. 
  =
Al
  ---------- Original Message ----------
  From: "Derek" <centroderek@ya=
hoo.com>
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: those "pops=
" "rolling thunder" "snaps"  and "boom"
  Date: Sun, 17 May 2009 13:16:01 -=
0000



  I've noticed this type of message is a constant theme within EVP =
transmissions.

  I am intrigued by the "robotic" voice, this could support=
 the holographic universe theory:

  www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DvnvM_YAwX4I
=

  I think it's worth approaching this field with a mind to helping those r=
equesting assitance. 

  But what does helping mean ? 
  Perhaps prayer or =
for those of an agnostic nature postive thoughts focused on the recipent do=
 have a tangeble effect, our "materialistic" nature may give a form of heav=
y duty thought energy which for those on the other side can effect "real wo=
rld" benefit.

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
  >
 =
 > Not to get all religious but do you folks have a prayer to say for some =
of 
  > these people? It must be that The Man Upstairs has given us all a j=
ob to 
  > do here, that's probably the reason He has allowed these groups =
to hear the 
  > other side. :>/ or something. sf
  > 
  > 
  > In a messag=
e dated 5/17/2009 7:28:44 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
  > Threadsintyme@..=
. writes:
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > You could pray for that female spiri=
t. Sometimes just knowing that they 
  > are not be alone helps.
  > Al
  >=

  > From: "James W. Hyslope" <clock=

  > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo:

  > One last question before I got to bed after 1am :) Wh=
at are those noises 
  > often heard before or after an EVP? I have found q=
uite a few voices that I 
  > wouldn't have noticed hadn't I first heard a =
"pop" sound. Actually had to do 
  > some MAJOR enhancing on 2 of them to e=
ven hear them at all. I mean one was 
  > impossibly buried in the noise. B=
ut after slowing it down I got a "wiff" of 
  > it, and through more passes=
 of the Audacity effects I was rewarded with a 
  > female voice. It was sa=
d though...she said in a mechanical pattern "can - 
  > you - help- me.....=
....please - help. Still, the audio is so painfully low. 
  > Hearing her p=
lea will forever effect me. Hopefully I can find someoneone 
  > here that =
can hear them as well as I. That can verify this for me :) I hear 
  > it..=
.but is nice to know someone else is there with you :) I went back to 
  > =
that location little over an hour later (after found the voice) Is under 1 =

  > mile from me. It's a real sad thing to hear and not knowing what to do=
.Jim H
